def pnm.pathfinding.agentManager.AgentManager.newAgent (   self,
  _node 
)

Create a new agent.

Note:
If an agent already exists on the given node, no new agent is created and the existing node is returned
Parameters:
_node - OGRE SceneNode to attach the agent to
Returns:
A new (or similar) agent

)

Set the navigation mesh.
